meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the radical that look like this are exactly the same. They are both <kanji>street</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: So you're walking down this <kanji>street</kanji>, and off in the distance you see the silhouette of somebody. A lady. Big, black curly hair and red eyes. It is the <kanji>street</kanji>-woman, Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう).
